item.title: Ex-Samsung Exec Accused of Building Copycat Chip Plant in China
item.description: Former Samsung Executive Accused of Stealing Trade Secrets A former Samsung executive has been accused of stealing trade secrets and building a copycat chip plant in China. The executive, who has not been named, is alleged to have stolen blueprints and designs for Samsung’s semiconductor plant in Xi’an, China.
